reviewText: Trash!
Too bad to watch..
I've seen junior high student vignettes better than these :(  Glad it was free.
Stupid 'movie'?
This anthology has 5 short films and a wacky host. Fun flick and totally off the wall. You will enjoy it if you go in knowing it's a Troma movie. Take a chance and check this out!!
Lots of Fun!!  Thumbs up to Dustin Mills.

I heard about this several years ago and was excited when it was finally made. I really enjoyed the segments but the frame story did get cheesy and a tad stupid at times. I definitely enjoyed Dustin Mills' segment which is a precursor to his fantastic movie Applecart.
Cool little flick
Ive been waiting on this anthology for years! and it was totally worth the wait!
This anthology is totally off the wall and features some of the best up and coming talent on the horror scene. Worth checking out!
Didn't like
Beyond stupid and a waste of time.
Lower quality b-movie. Acting was average / below average. Was bored with this movie, but for some reason couldn't stop watching til the end. XD
terrible movie
God no don't
Very low budget, awful...
Sometimes it only takes a few minutes to realize that you're watching crap. I don't know what this movie was attempting and I just couldn't torture myself by watching more than a few minutes.
very poorly done

Not bad, but not great.  Typical Troma film, so it was entertaining, but not really what i would call a horror film.  5 stories in all, surrounded by a skit trying to tie them all together.  Semi funny at times, but as i said, definately not spooky or horrorish.
WOW! Just a quasi-campy, late night horror tv show knock-off...without the camp.
